subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Quarterback Matt Ryan could not have been more accurate for the first half of the N.F.C. Championship game. That all changed for the Falcons offense with an interception, fumble and dubious decisions on two incompletions.
snippet: Quarterback Matt Ryan could not have been more accurate for the first half of the N.F.C. Championship game. That all changed for the Falcons offense with an interception, fumble and dubious decisions on two incompletions.
